content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Dec 2018What credit card do the rich/wealthiest people in Singapore carry?I've never seen one personally, but was chatting with a friend of mine recently and he said he say someone with a shiny metal card(the ones take make the metal noise when you hit it against something hard). Read up on cards like Centurion and all too, cool stuff. Wonder how many of SG's richest carry these? Or if they just have the normal cards like everyone else to blend in.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 11 Dec 2018I mean a lot of these cards are good at flaunting. Having them does mean you're at a certain wealth threshold at that point in time, but not having those cards doesn't mean you're not rich.0 comments0
